description:
3rd bars chords were blatantly off by an entire fourth. Verified the actual chords using live footage of the Metallica playing Trapped Under Ice.

Here is the video I used for those interested.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ja6Gaq8Vv5U 
You can clearly see James fretting the 2nd fret of the 4th string at the 7-8 second mark.
(via editor)
title: Trapped Under Ice
